page.title: 09FARMING
page.content: Most of the farmers concentrate on {arable}farming with{wheat,barley,sugar {beet}and{potatoes}being the most popular crops.{Sheep}farming is very widespread in all the farms but{cattle are less popular with{dairy farming almost non-existent. The area used to be well-known for{fruit}but most orchards have now disappeared and the land turned over to arable and sheep farming.David Yarnold (Machinery) is a new building near Clifton-on-Teme that sells{farm machinery.}They moved from the garage opposite which was known as the Green Garage.The new building contains a shop,stores and workshop and is used by farmers,gardeners and mechanics.They sell Fraser,Zetor and Fendt machinery.There are other {agricultural plant contractors}at Upper and Lower Sapey and Clifton-on- Teme.
